print "Installation completed"
print "For logging into Console please use the following URL:"
print "https://console-openshift-console.apps.{}.{}".format('@@{OPENSHIFT_SUBDOMAIN}@@','@@{BASE_DOMAIN}@@')
print "Credentials: kubeadmin / {}".format(base64.b64decode('@@{KUBEADMINB64}@@'))
print "For CLI access you can also connect to LB_DNS-Console."
print "Please run 'export KUBECONFIG=~/openshift/auth/kubeconfig' before using OC CLI Tool"

attrs.script:
export KUBECONFIG=~/openshift/auth/kubeconfig
echo """apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: ntnx-secret
  namespace: ntnx-system
stringData:
  key: @@{PE_IP}@@:9440:@@{PE_ADMIN}@@:@@{PE_PW}@@""" > ntnx-secret.yaml
echo """apiVersion: operators.coreos.com/v1
kind: OperatorGroup
metadata:
  name: ntnx-system-r8czl
  namespace: ntnx-system
spec:
  targetNamespaces:
  - ntnx-system""" > operatorgroup.yaml
echo """apiVersion: operators.coreos.com/v1alpha1
kind: Subscription
metadata:
  name: nutanixcsioperator
  namespace: ntnx-system
spec:
  channel: beta
  name: nutanixcsioperator
  installPlanApproval: Automatic
  source: certified-operators
  sourceNamespace: openshift-marketplace""" > subscription.yaml
echo """apiVersion: crd.nutanix.com/v1alpha1
kind: NutanixCsiStorage
metadata:
  name: nutanixcsistorage
  namespace: ntnx-system
spec:
  namespace: ntnx-system""" > instance.yaml
  
oc create ns ntnx-system
oc create -f ntnx-secret.yaml
oc create -f operatorgroup.yaml
oc create -f subscription.yaml

ATTEMPTS=0
ROLLOUT_STATUS_CMD="oc wait --for=condition=available --timeout=120s -n ntnx-system deployments nutanix-csi-operator-controller-manager"
until $ROLLOUT_STATUS_CMD || [ $ATTEMPTS -eq 12 ]; do
  $ROLLOUT_STATUS_CMD
  ATTEMPTS=$((attempts + 1))
  sleep 10
done

# Check deployment rollout status every 10 seconds (max 2 minutes) until complete.
ATTEMPTS=0
ROLLOUT_STATUS_CMD="oc get NutanixCsiStorage -n ntnx-system"
until $ROLLOUT_STATUS_CMD || [ $ATTEMPTS -eq 12 ]; do
  $ROLLOUT_STATUS_CMD
  ATTEMPTS=$((attempts + 1))
  sleep 10
done

oc create -f instance.yaml

action_list.description: Enables Image Registry on 100G Nutanix Volume (not for Production Usage)
action_list.name: Enable Image Registry

attrs.script:
export KUBECONFIG=~/openshift/auth/kubeconfig
echo """apiVersion: storage.k8s.io/v1
kind: StorageClass
metadata:
  name: nutanix-volume
provisioner: csi.nutanix.com
parameters:
  csi.storage.k8s.io/provisioner-secret-name: ntnx-secret
  csi.storage.k8s.io/provisioner-secret-namespace: ntnx-system
  csi.storage.k8s.io/node-publish-secret-name: ntnx-secret
  csi.storage.k8s.io/node-publish-secret-namespace: ntnx-system
  csi.storage.k8s.io/controller-expand-secret-name: ntnx-secret
  csi.storage.k8s.io/controller-expand-secret-namespace: ntnx-system
  csi.storage.k8s.io/fstype: ext4
  dataServiceEndPoint: @@{DS_IP}@@:3260
  storageContainer: @@{PE_CONTAINER}@@
  storageType: NutanixVolumes
  #whitelistIPMode: ENABLED
  #chapAuth: ENABLED
allowVolumeExpansion: true
reclaimPolicy: Delete""" > storageclass.yaml
echo """kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: image-registry-claim
  namespace: openshift-image-registry
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 100Gi
  storageClassName: nutanix-volume""" > pvc.yaml

oc create -f storageclass.yaml
oc create -f pvc.yaml

# Patch OC Image Registry to use created PVC
oc patch configs.imageregistry.operator.openshift.io cluster --type merge --patch '{"spec":{"managementState":"Managed","storage":{"pvc":{"claim":"image-registry-claim"}},"rolloutStrategy": "Recreate"}}'

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash -e
LB_DNS_STATUS="@@{LB_DNS.ST}@@"
BOOTSTRAP_IP="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
LB_DNS_USER="@@{CRED.username}@@"
LB_DNS_IP="@@{OpenshiftLB_DNS.address}@@"
OPENSHIFT_SUBDOMAIN="@@{OPENSHIFT_SUBDOMAIN}@@"
BASE_DOMAIN="@@{BASE_DOMAIN}@@"
MACHINE_NETWORK="@@{MACHINE_NETWORK}@@"
RDNS_RANGE="${MACHINE_NETWORK%.*}"
REV_ZONE_RANGE=$(echo ${RDNS_RANGE} | awk -F '.' '{OFS="."; print $3,$2,$1}')

GW=$(ip route list dev ens3 | awk ' /^default/ {print $3}')
SNM=$(/sbin/ifconfig ens3 | awk '/netmask/{ print $4;} ')
IPADDR=$(nmcli d show ens3 | awk ' /IP4.ADDRESS/ {print $2}')

sudo nmcli connection mod 'Wired connection 1' \
  ipv4.method manual \
  ipv4.addresses $IPADDR \
  ipv4.gateway $GW \
  ipv4.dns $LB_DNS_IP \
  connection.autoconnect yes

sudo coreos-installer install /dev/sda --ignition-url http://@@{PROVISIONING_VM}@@:8080/openshift/bootstrap_@@{OPENSHIFT_SUBDOMAIN}@@.ign --insecure-ignition --copy-network


BOOTSTRAP_IP_SUFFIX=$(echo "${BOOTSTRAP_IP}" | cut -d '.' -f4)

## Configure ssh agent
SSH_CRED="@@{CRED.secret}@@"
eval `ssh-agent -s`
ssh-add - <<<"${SSH_CRED}"

## Update DNS zones and LB config for Bootstrap ###
ssh ${LB_DNS_USER}@${LB_DNS_IP} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null << EOF
# Update DNS forward lookup zone
sudo sed -r -i '/^bootstrap/ s/0.0.0.0/'${BOOTSTRAP_IP}'/g'  /var/named/db.${OPENSHIFT_SUBDOMAIN}.${BASE_DOMAIN}
# Update DNS reverse lookup zone
sudo sed -r -i 's/^00/'${BOOTSTRAP_IP_SUFFIX}'/g' /var/named/db.${REV_ZONE_RANGE}.in-addr.arpa
# Update Load balancer config
sudo sed -r -i 's/0.0.0.0/'${BOOTSTRAP_IP}'/g' /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
# Reload services
sudo systemctl reload named && sudo systemctl reload haproxy
# Update resolv.conf
echo "nameserver ${LB_DNS_IP}" | sudo tee /etc/resolv.conf
EOF

# ## Update DNS zones and LB config for Bootstrap ###
# ssh ${LB_DNS_USER}@${LB_DNS_IP} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null << EOF
# # Update DNS forward lookup zone
# sudo sed -r -i '/bootstrap.ocp4/ s/[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+/'${BOOTSTRAP_IP}'/g'  /var/named/ocp4.example.com.db
# # Update DNS reverse lookup zone
# sudo sed -r -i '/bootstrap.ocp4/ s/^[0-9]+/'${BOOTSTRAP_IP_SUFFIX}'/g' /var/named/ocp4-reverse.db
# # Update Load balancer config
# sudo sed -r -i '/bootstrap/ s/[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+(:[0-9]+)/'${BOOTSTRAP_IP}'\1/g' /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
# # Reload services
# sudo systemctl reload named && sudo systemctl reload haproxy
# EOF

JWT = '@@{calm_jwt}@@'
vmUuid ='@@{id}@@'
# Get VM
api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/vms/{}'.format(vmUuid)
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json',  'Accept':'application/json', 'Authorization': 'Bearer {}'.format(JWT)}

r = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', headers=headers, verify=False)
if r.ok:
    resp = json.loads(r.content)

else:
    print("Post request failed", r.content)
    exit(1)

# Power off VM
del resp['status']

resp['spec']['resources']['power_state'] = 'OFF'

payload = resp

r = urlreq(api_url, verb='PUT', params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
if r.ok:
    resp = json.loads(r.content)
    taskUuid = resp['status']['execution_context']['task_uuid']

else:
    print("Post request failed", r.content)
    exit(1)


# Monitor task
state = ""
while state != "SUCCEEDED":
    api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/tasks/{}'.format(taskUuid)

    sleep(2)
    r = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', headers=headers, verify=False)
    if r.ok:
        resp = json.loads(r.content)
        state = resp['status']
        if state == "FAILED":
            print("Task failed", resp['progress_message'])
            exit(1)

    else:
        print("Post request failed", r.content)
        exit(1)

# Wait for VM to power off
api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/vms/{}'.format(vmUuid)
r = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', headers=headers, verify=False)
if r.ok:
    resp = json.loads(r.content)
    power_state = resp['status']['resources']['power_state']

else:
    print("Post request failed", r.content)
    exit(1)

state = ""
while state != "OFF":
    api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/vms/{}'.format(vmUuid)

    sleep(2)
    r = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', headers=headers, verify=False)
    if r.ok:
        resp = json.loads(r.content)
        state = resp['status']['resources']['power_state']
        if state == "FAILED":
            print("Task failed", resp['progress_message'])
            exit(1)

    else:
        print("Post request failed", r.content)
        exit(1)

# Remove ISO and Power on VM 
del resp['status']
# Remove ISO mount and disk size
disk_counter = 0
for disk in resp['spec']['resources']['disk_list']:
  del disk['disk_size_mib']
  if disk['device_properties']['device_type'] == "CDROM":
    del resp['spec']['resources']['disk_list'][disk_counter]
  disk_counter += 1


resp['spec']['resources']['power_state'] = 'ON'

api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/vms/{}'.format(vmUuid)
payload = resp

r = urlreq(api_url, verb='PUT', params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
if r.ok:
    resp = json.loads(r.content)
    taskUuid = resp['status']['execution_context']['task_uuid']

else:
    print("Post request failed", r.content)
    exit(1)

# Monitor task
state = ""
while state != "SUCCEEDED":
    api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/tasks/{}'.format(taskUuid)

    sleep(2)
    r = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', headers=headers, verify=False)
    if r.ok:
        resp = json.loads(r.content)
        state = resp['status']
        if state == "FAILED":
            print("Task failed", resp['progress_message'])
            exit(1)

    else:
        print("Post request failed", r.content)
        exit(1)

print("Removed ISO from Bootstrap and booted into Disk")

# Wait until VM boots
sleep(60)
print 'BOOTSTRAP_STATUS=Done'

ARRAY_INDEX="@@{calm_array_index}@@"
OPENSHIFT_SUBDOMAIN="@@{OPENSHIFT_SUBDOMAIN}@@"
BASE_DOMAIN="@@{BASE_DOMAIN}@@"
MACHINE_NETWORK="@@{MACHINE_NETWORK}@@"
RDNS_RANGE="${MACHINE_NETWORK%.*}"
REV_ZONE_RANGE=$(echo ${RDNS_RANGE} | awk -F '.' '{OFS="."; print $3,$2,$1}')
LB_DNS_IP="@@{OpenshiftLB_DNS.address}@@"
LB_DNS_USER="@@{CRED.username}@@"
GW=$(ip route list dev ens3 | awk ' /^default/ {print $3}')
SNM=$(/sbin/ifconfig ens3 | awk '/netmask/{ print $4;} ')
IPADDR=$(nmcli d show ens3 | awk ' /IP4.ADDRESS/ {print $2}')

# Configure ssh agent
SSH_CRED="@@{CRED.secret}@@"
eval `ssh-agent -s`
ssh-add - <<<"${SSH_CRED}"

sudo nmcli connection mod 'Wired connection 1' \
  ipv4.method manual \
  ipv4.addresses $IPADDR \
  ipv4.gateway $GW \
  ipv4.dns $LB_DNS_IP \
  connection.autoconnect yes

sudo coreos-installer install /dev/sda --ignition-url http://@@{PROVISIONING_VM}@@:8080/openshift/master_@@{OPENSHIFT_SUBDOMAIN}@@.ign --insecure-ignition --copy-network

if [ ${ARRAY_INDEX} -eq 0 ]; then

# SSH to LB/DNS server and update records
for i in "${!MASTER_IP_ARRAY[@]}"; do
MASTER_IP_SUFFIX=$(echo "${MASTER_IP_ARRAY[$i]}" | cut -d '.' -f4)
ssh ${LB_DNS_USER}@${LB_DNS_IP} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null << EOF
# Update DNS forward lookup zone
sudo sed -r -i '/^master|^etcd/ s/1.0.0.'${i}'/'${MASTER_IP_ARRAY[$i]}'/g' /var/named/db.${OPENSHIFT_SUBDOMAIN}.${BASE_DOMAIN}
# Update DNS reverse lookup zone
sudo sed -r -i 's/^1'${i}'/'${MASTER_IP_SUFFIX}'/g' /var/named/db.${REV_ZONE_RANGE}.in-addr.arpa
# Update Load balancer config
sudo sed -r -i 's/1.0.0.'${i}'/'${MASTER_IP_ARRAY[$i]}'/g' /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
if [ ${i} -eq 2 ]; then
sudo systemctl reload named && sudo systemctl reload haproxy
fi
EOF
done
fi

# # SSH to LB/DNS server and update records
# for i in "${!MASTER_IP_ARRAY[@]}"; do
# MASTER_IP_SUFFIX=$(echo "${MASTER_IP_ARRAY[$i]}" | cut -d '.' -f4)
# ssh ${LB_DNS_USER}@${LB_DNS_IP} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null << EOF
# # Update DNS forward lookup zone
# sudo sed -r -i '/master'${i}'.ocp4/ s/[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+/'${MASTER_IP_ARRAY[$i]}'/g'  /var/named/ocp4.example.com.db
# # Update DNS reverse lookup zone
# sudo sed -r -i '/master'${i}'.ocp4/ s/^[0-9]+/'${MASTER_IP_SUFFIX}'/g' /var/named/ocp4-reverse.db
# # Update Load balancer config
# sudo sed -r -i '/master'${i}'/ s/[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+(:[0-9]+)/'${MASTER_IP_ARRAY[$i]}'\1/g' /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
# if [ ${i} -eq 2 ]; then
# sudo systemctl reload named && sudo systemctl reload haproxy
# fi
# EOF
# done
# fi

JWT = '@@{calm_jwt}@@'
vmUuid ='@@{id}@@'
# Get VM
api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/vms/{}'.format(vmUuid)
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json',  'Accept':'application/json', 'Authorization': 'Bearer {}'.format(JWT)}

r = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', headers=headers, verify=False)
if r.ok:
    resp = json.loads(r.content)

else:
    print("Post request failed", r.content)
    exit(1)

# Power off VM
del resp['status']

resp['spec']['resources']['power_state'] = 'OFF'

payload = resp

r = urlreq(api_url, verb='PUT', params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
if r.ok:
    resp = json.loads(r.content)
    taskUuid = resp['status']['execution_context']['task_uuid']

else:
    print("Post request failed", r.content)
    exit(1)


# Monitor task
state = ""
while state != "SUCCEEDED":
    api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/tasks/{}'.format(taskUuid)

    sleep(2)
    r = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', headers=headers, verify=False)
    if r.ok:
        resp = json.loads(r.content)
        state = resp['status']
        if state == "FAILED":
            print("Task failed", resp['progress_message'])
            exit(1)

    else:
        print("Post request failed", r.content)
        exit(1)

# Wait for VM to power off
api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/vms/{}'.format(vmUuid)
r = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', headers=headers, verify=False)
if r.ok:
    resp = json.loads(r.content)
    power_state = resp['status']['resources']['power_state']

else:
    print("Post request failed", r.content)
    exit(1)

state = ""
while state != "OFF":
    api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/vms/{}'.format(vmUuid)

    sleep(2)
    r = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', headers=headers, verify=False)
    if r.ok:
        resp = json.loads(r.content)
        state = resp['status']['resources']['power_state']
        if state == "FAILED":
            print("Task failed", resp['progress_message'])
            exit(1)

    else:
        print("Post request failed", r.content)
        exit(1)

# Remove ISO and Power on VM 
del resp['status']
# Remove ISO mount and disk size
disk_counter = 0
for disk in resp['spec']['resources']['disk_list']:
  del disk['disk_size_mib']
  if disk['device_properties']['device_type'] == "CDROM":
    del resp['spec']['resources']['disk_list'][disk_counter]
  disk_counter += 1


resp['spec']['resources']['power_state'] = 'ON'

api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/vms/{}'.format(vmUuid)
payload = resp

r = urlreq(api_url, verb='PUT', params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
if r.ok:
    resp = json.loads(r.content)
    taskUuid = resp['status']['execution_context']['task_uuid']

else:
    print("Post request failed", r.content)
    exit(1)

# Monitor task
state = ""
while state != "SUCCEEDED":
    api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/tasks/{}'.format(taskUuid)

    sleep(2)
    r = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', headers=headers, verify=False)
    if r.ok:
        resp = json.loads(r.content)
        state = resp['status']
        if state == "FAILED":
            print("Task failed", resp['progress_message'])
            exit(1)

    else:
        print("Post request failed", r.content)
        exit(1)

print("Removed ISO from Bootstrap and booted into Disk")

# Wait until VM boots
sleep(60)
print "MASTER_STATUS=Done"

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash -e

# Get machine IP
MACHINE_IP="@@{OpenshiftLB_DNS.address}@@"
SSH_USER="@@{CRED.username}@@"

# Inject ssh key pair into the VM for provisioning support
mkdir -m 700 -p ~/.ssh
cat <<EOF >~/.ssh/id_rsa
@@{CRED.secret}@@
EOF
chmod 600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa
cat <<EOF > ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub
@@{CRED.public_key}@@
EOF

# Env setup
mkdir -p openshift
cd openshift

# Use rackspace repo mirrors
# Temporary bypass for centos mirror list issue which cropped up today
ls /etc/yum.repos.d | while read i; do
sudo sed -i '/mirrorlist.centos.org/d' /etc/yum.repos.d/"${i}"
sudo sed -i -r '/^#baseurl/ s/#(baseurl)/\1/g;s/mirror.centos.org/mirror.rackspace.com/g' /etc/yum.repos.d/"${i}"
done

# Install dependencies
# sudo yum -y update
sudo yum -y install jq haproxy bind python3

# Disable selinux
sudo setenforce 0
sudo sed -i.bkp -r 's/(SELINUX=)enforcing/\1disabled/g;s/^SELINUXTYPE=targeted/#&/g' /etc/selinux/config

# Download Openshift installer
curl -o openshift-install-linux.tar.gz http://@@{PROVISIONING_VM}@@:8080/openshift/openshift-install-linux.tar.gz
tar xzf openshift-install-linux.tar.gz
sudo install -m 755 -o root openshift-install /sbin/

### Disabled temporarily since a different provisioning VM is used ###
## Download coreos-installer
# curl -o coreos-installer https://mirror.openshift.com/pub/openshift-v4/clients/coreos-installer/latest/coreos-installer
# sudo install -m 755 -o root coreos-installer /sbin/

# Download Openshift client
curl -o openshift-client-linux.tar.gz http://@@{PROVISIONING_VM}@@:8080/openshift/openshift-client-linux.tar.gz
tar xzf openshift-client-linux.tar.gz
sudo install -m 755 -o root oc /sbin/

#!/bin/bash -xe

# Inject haproxy config template
cat << EOF | sudo tee -a /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
#---------------------------------------------------------------------
# Openshift config
#---------------------------------------------------------------------

listen stats
    bind :9000
    mode http
    stats enable
    stats uri /
    monitor-uri /healthz


frontend openshift-api-server
    bind *:6443
    default_backend openshift-api-server
    mode tcp
    option tcplog

backend openshift-api-server
    balance source
    mode tcp
    server bootstrap 0.0.0.0:6443 check # Disable after provisioning
    server master0 1.0.0.0:6443 check
    server master1 1.0.0.1:6443 check
    server master2 1.0.0.2:6443 check

frontend machine-config-server
    bind *:22623
    default_backend machine-config-server
    mode tcp
    option tcplog

backend machine-config-server
    # Don't add masters since initial config is seeded from bootstrap
    balance source
    mode tcp
    server bootstrap 0.0.0.0:22623 check

frontend ingress-http
    bind *:80
    default_backend ingress-http
    mode tcp
    option tcplog

backend ingress-http
    balance source
    mode tcp
    # server worker0 2.0.0.0:80 check
    # server worker1 2.0.0.1:80 check
    server master0 1.0.0.0:80 check
    server master1 1.0.0.1:80 check
    server master2 1.0.0.2:80 check

frontend ingress-https
    bind *:443
    default_backend ingress-https
    mode tcp
    option tcplog

backend ingress-https
    balance source
    mode tcp
    # server worker0 2.0.0.0:443 check
    # server worker1 2.0.0.1:443 check
    server master0 1.0.0.0:443 check
    server master1 1.0.0.1:443 check
    server master2 1.0.0.2:443 check
EOF

sudo systemctl enable haproxy
sudo systemctl start haproxy
print 'ST=@@{OPENSHIFT_SUBDOMAIN}@@'

#!/bin/bash -e
# Use macro from master set var task to delay task execution
MASTER_STATUS="@@{Master.MASTER_STATUS}@@"

cd openshift
# Wait for bootstrap completion
sudo openshift-install wait-for bootstrap-complete --log-level debug
# Remove bootstrap entry from haproxy and reload haproxy
sudo sed -i '/server bootstrap.*:6443/ s/server/#&/g' /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
sudo systemctl reload haproxy
# Wait for openshift installation to complete
sudo openshift-install wait-for install-complete --log-level debug

            exit(1)

    else:
        print("Post request failed", r.content)
        exit(1)

print("Removed ISO from Bootstrap and booted into Disk")

# Wait until VM boots
sleep(60)
print 'BOOTSTRAP_STATUS=Done'

#!/bin/bash -e
BOOTSTRAP_STATUS="@@{Boostrap.BOOTSTRAP_STATUS}@@"
MASTER_IP_MACRO="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
MASTER_IP_ARRAY=(${MASTER_IP_MACRO//,/ })
ARRAY_INDEX="@@{calm_array_index}@@"
OPENSHIFT_SUBDOMAIN="@@{OPENSHIFT_SUBDOMAIN}@@"
BASE_DOMAIN="@@{BASE_DOMAIN}@@"
MACHINE_NETWORK="@@{MACHINE_NETWORK}@@"
RDNS_RANGE="${MACHINE_NETWORK%.*}"
REV_ZONE_RANGE=$(echo ${RDNS_RANGE} | awk -F '.' '{OFS="."; print $3,$2,$1}')
LB_DNS_IP="@@{OpenshiftLB_DNS.address}@@"
LB_DNS_USER="@@{CRED.username}@@"
GW=$(ip route list dev ens3 | awk ' /^default/ {print $3}')
SNM=$(/sbin/ifconfig ens3 | awk '/netmask/{ print $4;} ')
IPADDR=$(nmcli d show ens3 | awk ' /IP4.ADDRESS/ {print $2}')

# Configure ssh agent
SSH_CRED="@@{CRED.secret}@@"
eval `ssh-agent -s`
ssh-add - <<<"${SSH_CRED}"

sudo nmcli connection mod 'Wired connection 1' \
  ipv4.method manual \
  ipv4.addresses $IPADDR \
  ipv4.gateway $GW \
  ipv4.dns $LB_DNS_IP \
  connection.autoconnect yes

sudo coreos-installer install /dev/sda --ignition-url http://@@{PROVISIONING_VM}@@:8080/openshift/master_@@{OPENSHIFT_SUBDOMAIN}@@.ign --insecure-ignition --copy-network

if [ ${ARRAY_INDEX} -eq 0 ]; then

# SSH to LB/DNS server and update records
for i in "${!MASTER_IP_ARRAY[@]}"; do
MASTER_IP_SUFFIX=$(echo "${MASTER_IP_ARRAY[$i]}" | cut -d '.' -f4)
ssh ${LB_DNS_USER}@${LB_DNS_IP} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null << EOF
# Update DNS forward lookup zone
sudo sed -r -i '/^master|^etcd/ s/1.0.0.'${i}'/'${MASTER_IP_ARRAY[$i]}'/g' /var/named/db.${OPENSHIFT_SUBDOMAIN}.${BASE_DOMAIN}
# Update DNS reverse lookup zone
sudo sed -r -i 's/^1'${i}'/'${MASTER_IP_SUFFIX}'/g' /var/named/db.${REV_ZONE_RANGE}.in-addr.arpa
# Update Load balancer config
sudo sed -r -i 's/1.0.0.'${i}'/'${MASTER_IP_ARRAY[$i]}'/g' /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
if [ ${i} -eq 2 ]; then
sudo systemctl reload named && sudo systemctl reload haproxy
fi
EOF
done
fi

# # SSH to LB/DNS server and update records
# for i in "${!MASTER_IP_ARRAY[@]}"; do
# MASTER_IP_SUFFIX=$(echo "${MASTER_IP_ARRAY[$i]}" | cut -d '.' -f4)
# ssh ${LB_DNS_USER}@${LB_DNS_IP} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null << EOF
# # Update DNS forward lookup zone
# sudo sed -r -i '/master'${i}'.ocp4/ s/[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+/'${MASTER_IP_ARRAY[$i]}'/g'  /var/named/ocp4.example.com.db
# # Update DNS reverse lookup zone
# sudo sed -r -i '/master'${i}'.ocp4/ s/^[0-9]+/'${MASTER_IP_SUFFIX}'/g' /var/named/ocp4-reverse.db
# # Update Load balancer config
# sudo sed -r -i '/master'${i}'/ s/[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+(:[0-9]+)/'${MASTER_IP_ARRAY[$i]}'\1/g' /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
# if [ ${i} -eq 2 ]; then
# sudo systemctl reload named && sudo systemctl reload haproxy
# fi
# EOF
# done
# fi

JWT = '@@{calm_jwt}@@'
vmUuid ='@@{id}@@'
# Get VM
api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/vms/{}'.format(vmUuid)
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json',  'Accept':'application/json', 'Authorization': 'Bearer {}'.format(JWT)}

r = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', headers=headers, verify=False)
if r.ok:
    resp = json.loads(r.content)

else:
    print("Post request failed", r.content)
    exit(1)

# Power off VM
del resp['status']

resp['spec']['resources']['power_state'] = 'OFF'

payload = resp

r = urlreq(api_url, verb='PUT', params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
if r.ok:
    resp = json.loads(r.content)
    taskUuid = resp['status']['execution_context']['task_uuid']

else:
    print("Post request failed", r.content)
    exit(1)


# Monitor task
state = ""
while state != "SUCCEEDED":
    api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/tasks/{}'.format(taskUuid)

    sleep(2)
    r = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', headers=headers, verify=False)
    if r.ok:
        resp = json.loads(r.content)
        state = resp['status']
        if state == "FAILED":
            print("Task failed", resp['progress_message'])
            exit(1)

    else:
        print("Post request failed", r.content)
        exit(1)

# Wait for VM to power off
api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/vms/{}'.format(vmUuid)
r = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', headers=headers, verify=False)
if r.ok:
    resp = json.loads(r.content)
    power_state = resp['status']['resources']['power_state']

else:
    print("Post request failed", r.content)
    exit(1)

state = ""
while state != "OFF":
    api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/vms/{}'.format(vmUuid)

    sleep(2)
    r = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', headers=headers, verify=False)
    if r.ok:
        resp = json.loads(r.content)
        state = resp['status']['resources']['power_state']
        if state == "FAILED":
            print("Task failed", resp['progress_message'])
            exit(1)

    else:
        print("Post request failed", r.content)
        exit(1)

# Remove ISO and Power on VM 
del resp['status']
# Remove ISO mount and disk size
disk_counter = 0
for disk in resp['spec']['resources']['disk_list']:
  del disk['disk_size_mib']
  if disk['device_properties']['device_type'] == "CDROM":
    del resp['spec']['resources']['disk_list'][disk_counter]
  disk_counter += 1


resp['spec']['resources']['power_state'] = 'ON'

api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/vms/{}'.format(vmUuid)
payload = resp

r = urlreq(api_url, verb='PUT', params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers, verify=False)
if r.ok:
    resp = json.loads(r.content)
    taskUuid = resp['status']['execution_context']['task_uuid']

else:
    print("Post request failed", r.content)
    exit(1)

# Monitor task
state = ""
while state != "SUCCEEDED":
    api_url = 'https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/v3/tasks/{}'.format(taskUuid)

    sleep(2)
    r = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', headers=headers, verify=False)
    if r.ok:
        resp = json.loads(r.content)
        state = resp['status']
        if state == "FAILED":
            print("Task failed", resp['progress_message'])
            exit(1)

    else:
        print("Post request failed", r.content)
        exit(1)

print("Removed ISO from Bootstrap and booted into Disk")

# Wait until VM boots
sleep(60)
print "MASTER_STATUS=Done"

#!/bin/bash -e

# Get machine IP
MACHINE_IP="@@{OpenshiftLB_DNS.address}@@"
SSH_USER="@@{CRED.username}@@"

# Inject ssh key pair into the VM for provisioning support
mkdir -m 700 -p ~/.ssh
cat <<EOF >~/.ssh/id_rsa
@@{CRED.secret}@@
EOF
chmod 600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa
cat <<EOF > ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub
@@{CRED.public_key}@@
EOF

# Env setup
mkdir -p openshift
cd openshift

# Use rackspace repo mirrors
# Temporary bypass for centos mirror list issue which cropped up today
ls /etc/yum.repos.d | while read i; do
sudo sed -i '/mirrorlist.centos.org/d' /etc/yum.repos.d/"${i}"
sudo sed -i -r '/^#baseurl/ s/#(baseurl)/\1/g;s/mirror.centos.org/mirror.rackspace.com/g' /etc/yum.repos.d/"${i}"
done

# Install dependencies
# sudo yum -y update
sudo yum -y install jq haproxy bind python3

# Disable selinux
sudo setenforce 0
sudo sed -i.bkp -r 's/(SELINUX=)enforcing/\1disabled/g;s/^SELINUXTYPE=targeted/#&/g' /etc/selinux/config

# Download Openshift installer
curl -o openshift-install-linux.tar.gz http://@@{PROVISIONING_VM}@@:8080/openshift/openshift-install-linux.tar.gz
tar xzf openshift-install-linux.tar.gz
sudo install -m 755 -o root openshift-install /sbin/

### Disabled temporarily since a different provisioning VM is used ###
## Download coreos-installer
# curl -o coreos-installer https://mirror.openshift.com/pub/openshift-v4/clients/coreos-installer/latest/coreos-installer
# sudo install -m 755 -o root coreos-installer /sbin/

# Download Openshift client
curl -o openshift-client-linux.tar.gz http://@@{PROVISIONING_VM}@@:8080/openshift/openshift-client-linux.tar.gz
tar xzf openshift-client-linux.tar.gz
sudo install -m 755 -o root oc /sbin/

#!/bin/bash -xe

# Inject haproxy config template
cat << EOF | sudo tee -a /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
#---------------------------------------------------------------------
# Openshift config
#---------------------------------------------------------------------

listen stats
    bind :9000
    mode http
    stats enable
    stats uri /
    monitor-uri /healthz


frontend openshift-api-server
    bind *:6443
    default_backend openshift-api-server
    mode tcp
    option tcplog

backend openshift-api-server
    balance source
    mode tcp
    server bootstrap 0.0.0.0:6443 check # Disable after provisioning
    server master0 1.0.0.0:6443 check
    server master1 1.0.0.1:6443 check
    server master2 1.0.0.2:6443 check

frontend machine-config-server
    bind *:22623
    default_backend machine-config-server
    mode tcp
    option tcplog

backend machine-config-server
    # Don't add masters since initial config is seeded from bootstrap
    balance source
    mode tcp
    server bootstrap 0.0.0.0:22623 check

frontend ingress-http
    bind *:80
    default_backend ingress-http
    mode tcp
    option tcplog

backend ingress-http
    balance source
    mode tcp
    # server worker0 2.0.0.0:80 check
    # server worker1 2.0.0.1:80 check
    server master0 1.0.0.0:80 check
    server master1 1.0.0.1:80 check
    server master2 1.0.0.2:80 check

frontend ingress-https
    bind *:443
    default_backend ingress-https
    mode tcp
    option tcplog

backend ingress-https
    balance source
    mode tcp
    # server worker0 2.0.0.0:443 check
    # server worker1 2.0.0.1:443 check
    server master0 1.0.0.0:443 check
    server master1 1.0.0.1:443 check
    server master2 1.0.0.2:443 check
EOF

sudo systemctl enable haproxy
sudo systemctl start haproxy
print 'ST=@@{OPENSHIFT_SUBDOMAIN}@@'

mkdir -p openshift/auth
cd openshift/auth
echo @@{KUBECONFIGB64}@@ | base64 -d > kubeconfig
echo @@{KUBEADMINB64}@@ | base64 -d > kubeadmin-password

#!/bin/bash -e
# Use macro from master set var task to delay task execution
MASTER_STATUS="@@{Master.MASTER_STATUS}@@"

cd openshift
# Wait for bootstrap completion
sudo openshift-install wait-for bootstrap-complete --log-level debug
# Remove bootstrap entry from haproxy and reload haproxy
sudo sed -i '/server bootstrap.*:6443/ s/server/#&/g' /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
sudo systemctl reload haproxy
# Wait for openshift installation to complete
sudo openshift-install wait-for install-complete --log-level debug

export KUBECONFIG=~/openshift/auth/kubeconfig
echo """apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: ntnx-secret
  namespace: ntnx-system
stringData:
  key: @@{PE_IP}@@:9440:@@{PE_ADMIN}@@:@@{PE_PW}@@""" > ntnx-secret.yaml
echo """apiVersion: operators.coreos.com/v1
kind: OperatorGroup
metadata:
  name: ntnx-system-r8czl
  namespace: ntnx-system
spec:
  targetNamespaces:
  - ntnx-system""" > operatorgroup.yaml
echo """apiVersion: operators.coreos.com/v1alpha1
kind: Subscription
metadata:
  name: nutanixcsioperator
  namespace: ntnx-system
spec:
  channel: beta
  name: nutanixcsioperator
  installPlanApproval: Automatic
  source: certified-operators
  sourceNamespace: openshift-marketplace""" > subscription.yaml
echo """apiVersion: crd.nutanix.com/v1alpha1
kind: NutanixCsiStorage
metadata:
  name: nutanixcsistorage
  namespace: ntnx-system
spec:
  namespace: ntnx-system""" > instance.yaml
  
oc create ns ntnx-system
oc create -f ntnx-secret.yaml
oc create -f operatorgroup.yaml
oc create -f subscription.yaml

ATTEMPTS=0
ROLLOUT_STATUS_CMD="oc wait --for=condition=available --timeout=120s -n ntnx-system deployments nutanix-csi-operator-controller-manager"
until $ROLLOUT_STATUS_CMD || [ $ATTEMPTS -eq 12 ]; do
  $ROLLOUT_STATUS_CMD
  ATTEMPTS=$((attempts + 1))
  sleep 10
done

# Check deployment rollout status every 10 seconds (max 2 minutes) until complete.
ATTEMPTS=0
ROLLOUT_STATUS_CMD="oc get NutanixCsiStorage -n ntnx-system"
until $ROLLOUT_STATUS_CMD || [ $ATTEMPTS -eq 12 ]; do
  $ROLLOUT_STATUS_CMD
  ATTEMPTS=$((attempts + 1))
  sleep 10
done

oc create -f instance.yaml

action_list.description: Enables Image Registry on 100G Nutanix Volume (not for Production Usage)

attrs.script:
export KUBECONFIG=~/openshift/auth/kubeconfig
echo """apiVersion: storage.k8s.io/v1
kind: StorageClass
metadata:
  name: nutanix-volume
provisioner: csi.nutanix.com
parameters:
  csi.storage.k8s.io/provisioner-secret-name: ntnx-secret
  csi.storage.k8s.io/provisioner-secret-namespace: ntnx-system
  csi.storage.k8s.io/node-publish-secret-name: ntnx-secret
  csi.storage.k8s.io/node-publish-secret-namespace: ntnx-system
  csi.storage.k8s.io/controller-expand-secret-name: ntnx-secret
  csi.storage.k8s.io/controller-expand-secret-namespace: ntnx-system
  csi.storage.k8s.io/fstype: ext4
  dataServiceEndPoint: @@{DS_IP}@@:3260
  storageContainer: @@{PE_CONTAINER}@@
  storageType: NutanixVolumes
  #whitelistIPMode: ENABLED
  #chapAuth: ENABLED
allowVolumeExpansion: true
reclaimPolicy: Delete""" > storageclass.yaml
echo """kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: image-registry-claim
  namespace: openshift-image-registry
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 100Gi
  storageClassName: nutanix-volume""" > pvc.yaml

oc create -f storageclass.yaml
oc create -f pvc.yaml

# Patch OC Image Registry to use created PVC
oc patch configs.imageregistry.operator.openshift.io cluster --type merge --patch '{"spec":{"managementState":"Managed","storage":{"pvc":{"claim":"image-registry-claim"}},"rolloutStrategy": "Recreate"}}'

action_list.name: Enable Image Registry
